title: About me
text:
𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚-𝐃𝐫𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐧 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐬𝐭 | 𝐁𝐈 & 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚 𝐕𝐢𝐬𝐮𝐚𝐥𝐢𝐳𝐚𝐭𝐢𝐨𝐧 | 𝐄𝐱𝐜𝐞𝐥 | 𝐏𝐲𝐭𝐡𝐨𝐧 | 𝐑 | 𝐁𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐧𝐞𝐬𝐬 & 𝐃𝐚𝐭𝐚 𝐀𝐧𝐚𝐥𝐲𝐭𝐢𝐜𝐬 𝐄𝐧𝐭𝐡𝐮𝐬𝐢𝐚𝐬𝐭
With a year of hands-on experience as a Business Analyst, I have honed my skills in crafting robust and efficient solutions. My journey has been marked by a deep passion for continuous learning and a commitment to building responsive, user-friendly interfaces.
Proficient in Microsoft Excel, Power BI, Python, and R, I leverage these tools to analyze data and develop insights that drive informed decisions. My background in software development and analysis has equipped me with a solid foundation in problem-solving and innovative thinking, which I am excited to apply to new opportunities in Analyst roles.
I am actively seeking to transition into an Analyst position where I can combine my technical expertise with my analytical skills to contribute to impactful projects and drive business success.
